body_html:
Btw, with this change, I could re-enable word2vec example GPU support: https://github.com/fpmchu/tensorflow/commit/121784b62da64f3a799cc0eb6776ca4f35594a9f

However, on my machine, this made the example slower. Either it's because my card is weak, or perhaps the example needs to be optimized for using GPU? I'm not sure if it's my code that's slow...

body:
Btw, with this change, I could re-enable word2vec example GPU support: https://github.com/fpmchu/tensorflow/commit/121784b62da64f3a799cc0eb6776ca4f35594a9f

However, on my machine, this made the example _slower_.  Either it's because my card is weak, or perhaps the example needs to be optimized for using GPU?  I'm not sure if it's my code that's slow...
